name: kafka-spark-project
description: Kafka, Spark, Node.js - Financial Data Streaming Experiment

scripts.setup: npm install && cd ./backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ./SparkStreamer && mvn clean install
scripts.start:spark: cd ./SparkStreamer && mvn clean install && mvn exec:java
scripts.start:dev: concurrently -k --allow-restart --names 'KAFKA,BACKEND,FRONTEND,SPARK' --prefix-colors 'yellow,blue,magenta,cyan' 'npm run start:kafka' 'npm run start:backend' 'npm run start:frontend' 'npm run start:spark'
scripts.docker:build: cd ./backend & npm run docker:build & cd ../frontend & npm run docker:build
scripts.test: cd ./backend && npm run test && cd ../frontend && npm run test
